com.facebook.buck.cli

Class TestRuleKeyFileHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.cli.TestRuleKeyFileHelper

  • public class TestRuleKeyFileHelper
extends Object
    Helper class to annotate and validate an output directory of a test with a rule key.
